member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_TRANSITION_BARRIER
member.summary: Describes the transition of subresources between different usages.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_TRANSITION_BARRIER.pResource
member.summary: A pointer to the object that represents the resource used in the transition.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_TRANSITION_BARRIER.Subresource
member.summary: The index of the subresource for the transition. Use the D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER_ALL_SUBRESOURCES flag ( 0xffffffff ) to transition all subresources in a resource at the same time.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_TRANSITION_BARRIER.StateBefore
member.summary: The "before" usages of the subresources, as a bitwise-OR'd combination of enumeration constants.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_TRANSITION_BARRIER.StateAfter
member.summary: The "after" usages of the subresources, as a bitwise-OR'd combination of enumeration constants.
